item.title: Glenn Gould's Forte: The Pianist's Secret to Winning at the Market
item.description: Discover the surprising investing prowess of legendary pianist Glenn Gould. How did he tune out market noise to become a successful long-term investor? Three unique characters analyze his investment philosophy and portfolio, exploring the two sides of his genius: disciplined, emotion-free principles and a profound belief in what he loved.
